text.more: Twitterverse of Belgrade anti-government protests against media censorship, political violence and rising autocracy in Serbia. There are 4958 nodes and 10298 edges. The network consists of tweets containing the hashtag #1od5miliona, posted between January 16,  and January 20. Two nodes are linked if one user retweets another user's tweet. Nodes are sized based on betweenness centrality. Blue are anti-govt, and redish are pro-govt - the network is clearly polarized. Anti-govt network has a much better information flow, due to the high number of brokers
text.title: Anti-government protests in Belgrade, January 19: #1od5miliona
